type_description: Original Fumos, the most common type of Fumo.
Fumos that are small enough to be used as keychains.
Fumos that are larger than Standard Type but smaller than Deka Type.
The Biggest Fumos, more larger than Mannaka Type.
Laminated book dividers with Fumos designs.
Acrylic keychain with Fumo-style artwork, featuring a chibi character and a sturdy metal clip. Part of Gift's official accessory line.
A Japanese-style keychain with a metal plate and chibi Fumo art, featuring a lanyard for attaching to devices. Part of a numbered series by Gift with Touhou characters.
An acrylic figure with a Fumo design that can be displayed on a stand or used as a keychain.
A mousepad featuring a Fumo design, providing a comfortable surface for mouse movement.
This is a customization sticker for decorating the top surface of IC cards such as suica, PASMO and taspo cards.
A rubber keychain with a Fumo design, featuring a sturdy metal clip. Part of Gift's official accessory line.
A mechanical pencil with a Fumo design, part of Gift's official accessory line.
A Japanese-style teacup with a Fumo design, part of Gift's official accessory line.
A mug with a Fumo design, part of Gift's official accessory line.
A cushion with a Fumo design, part of Gift's official accessory line.
A large tin badge with a Fumo design, part of Gift's official accessory line.
